description:
Feeling stuck? Fear is insidious in it's power to keep us from moving forward in manifesting our dreams. In this course we'll use writing, yoga, somatic exercises and meditation to face our fears and move forward into creating a life we love. The course is 4 modules divided into writing and yoga. The yoga is accessible to all levels and is less about getting into a perfect pose, but rather reconnecting to our body and allowing our energy to flow.

So grab a journal, a yoga mat and bring your open heart.
title: The Yoga & Mind/Body Approach to Overcoming Obstacles
